workshoptitle: .NET Development with Oracle Autonomous Database Quick Start

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: .NET Development with Oracle Autonomous Database Quick Start

tutorials.title: Get started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable).

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Provision Oracle Autonomous Database
tutorials.description: Create an Oracle Autonomous Database instance

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Create user and setup schema
tutorials.description: Create a database user and setup a table with sample data.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Set up networking
tutorials.description: Set up networking to facilitate communication between the web server and Oracle Autonomous Database.

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Provision and set up the web server
tutorials.description: Create an Oracle Cloud Infrastructure virtual machine and set up the web server with ASP.NET Core.

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Enable one-way TLS without wallets
tutorials.description: Permit the web server to connect to Oracle Autonomous Database without requiring a wallet.

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Develop and deploy the .NET web application
tutorials.description: Create a simple ASP.NET Core app, connnect to the database using Oracle Data Provider for .NET, and retrieve sample data to the web page.

tutorials.title: Lab 7: Clean up lab resources
tutorials.description: Terminate resources used in this lab if they will no longer be used.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
